project_abstract.cdata: The Third Rural Credit Project aims to (a) stimulate growth and diversification of agriculture by expanding availability of medium-and long-term credit, and (b) increase the Agricultural Bank of China's (ABC's) operational efficiency through institutional development.  Specifically, the project through ABC would use project funds to provide subloans to households, cooperatives, collective enterprises, state-owned enterprises and state-collective partnerships for investments in tree crops, livestock, aquaculture and agro-processing.  This lending would be in six of China's poorer provinces: Guizhou, Sichuan and Yunnan in the southwest and Anhui, Henan and Hubei in the north central region.  The project's technical assistance component for institutional development would be used to strengthen ABC's  in-house staff training capability, and to conduct studies of ABC and the Rural Credit Cooperative (RCC) operations.  The focus of this institutional development program is to assist in the Government's effort to reshape ABC's role consistent with the ongoing reform of the financial system.

P003461.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>第三农村信贷项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>本项目旨在：（1）通过增加提供中长期信贷刺激农业增长和多种经营；（2）通过制度建设提高中国农业银行的运营效率。具体讲，通过中国农业银行实施的该项目将利用项目资金，向农户、合作社、集体企业、国有企业和国家集体联营企业提供子贷款，资助果树或豆类作物栽培、畜牧养殖、水产养殖和农产品加工。项目在中国六个较贫困省份实施，包括西南地区的贵州、四川和云南三省以及中北部地区的安徽、河南和湖北三省。技术援助子项目将开展制度建设活动，以增强中国农业银行对其内部工作人员进行培训的能力，同时开展关于中国农业银行和农村信用合作社运营情况的研究。制度建设活动旨在协助中国政府按照现行金融体制改革要求调整中国农业银行的职能。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
